root.name: Mobile Suit Gundam: Senjo No Kazuna
root.description: The game is ported over from the arcade, up to 8 players can participate in 4 vs 4 battles over Wi-Fi. There are 5 types of Mobile Suits to choose from: Close Combat, Close Range, Support/Medium Range, Long Distance/Bombardment and Sniper. The game will have game sharing function, your friend can play versus battle without a copy of the game. The single player mode will have a large number of missions not found in the arcade version.
